reviewText: This is the best documentary on the world of bdsm. The interviews with key authors and people with long experience in the lifestyle make it authentic and a good source of information for those considering this approach to sexuality. I own a copy of this and have watched it many times with small groups. Every time the audience is strongly affected by the content and comes away with a much deeper knowledge and an understanding of how their own desires may be developed within the bdsm framework.
